content:
TITLE: AES Text Encryption Example
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt plain text using AES encryption.
SOURCE: https://github.com/brix/crypto-js/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
var CryptoJS = require("crypto-js");

// Encrypt
var ciphertext = CryptoJS.AES.encrypt('my message', 'secret key 123').toString();

// Decrypt
var bytes  = CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(ciphertext, 'secret key 123');
var originalText = bytes.toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8);

console.log(originalText); // 'my message'
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: AES Object Encryption Example
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to encrypt and decrypt JavaScript objects using AES encryption.
SOURCE: https://github.com/brix/crypto-js/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
var CryptoJS = require("crypto-js");

var data = [{id: 1}, {id: 2}]

// Encrypt
var ciphertext = CryptoJS.AES.encrypt(JSON.stringify(data), 'secret key 123').toString();

// Decrypt
var bytes  = CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(ciphertext, 'secret key 123');
var decryptedData = JSON.parse(bytes.toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8));

console.log(decryptedData); // [{id: 1}, {id: 2}]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: ES6 Import and API Signing Example
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to import specific CryptoJS modules and use them for API call signing with SHA256 and HMAC-SHA512.
SOURCE: https://github.com/brix/crypto-js/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import sha256 from 'crypto-js/sha256';
import hmacSHA512 from 'crypto-js/hmac-sha512';
import Base64 from 'crypto-js/enc-base64';

const message, nonce, path, privateKey; // ...
const hashDigest = sha256(nonce + message);
const hmacDigest = Base64.stringify(hmacSHA512(path + hashDigest, privateKey));
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Complete Library Import Example
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import the entire CryptoJS library for access to all methods.
SOURCE: https://github.com/brix/crypto-js/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
var CryptoJS = require("crypto-js");
console.log(CryptoJS.HmacSHA1("Message", "Key"));
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Modular Include Example
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to require specific CryptoJS modules using Node.js require syntax.
SOURCE: https://github.com/brix/crypto-js/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
var AES = require("crypto-js/aes");
var SHA256 = require("crypto-js/sha256");
...
console.log(SHA256("Message"));
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing CryptoJS with NPM
DESCRIPTION: Command to install CryptoJS package using Node Package Manager (NPM).
SOURCE: https://github.com/brix/crypto-js/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install crypto-js
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Browser RequireJS Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Configuration for using CryptoJS with RequireJS in browser environments.
SOURCE: https://github.com/brix/crypto-js/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
require.config({
    packages: [
        {
            name: 'crypto-js',
            location: 'path-to/bower_components/crypto-js',
            main: 'index'
        }
    ]
});

require(["crypto-js/aes", "crypto-js/sha256"], function (AES, SHA256) {
    console.log(SHA256("Message"));
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Browser Direct Include Example
DESCRIPTION: Example of using CryptoJS directly in browser without RequireJS.
SOURCE: https://github.com/brix/crypto-js/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<script type="text/javascript" src="path-to/bower_components/crypto-js/crypto-js.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    var encrypted = CryptoJS.AES(...);
    var encrypted = CryptoJS.SHA256(...);
</script>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies for CryptoJS Project in Shell
DESCRIPTION: Command to install all required dependencies for the CryptoJS project using npm. This should be run after cloning the repository and before building the project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/brix/crypto-js/blob/develop/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building the CryptoJS Project in Shell
DESCRIPTION: Command to build the CryptoJS project using npm. After running this command, the build output will be available in the build folder.
SOURCE: https://github.com/brix/crypto-js/blob/develop/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm run build
```
